trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

trans-unit.resname: PJ21·1 | Morophon, the Boundless | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: Spells of the chosen type you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

trans-unit.resname: PJ21·1 | Morophon, the Boundless | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
